english.segment1: I'll lay it out for all to see. What You my God have done for me. I'm not holding back now. Oh, ohh
english.segment2: I got my heart on my sleeve. No lies in between. I'm not holding back
english.segment3: I'm gonna sing. I'm gonna dance. I'm gonna praise You. Like I never had the chance
english.segment4: And I'm gonna run. Like I've been set free. I'm gonna live. All for You my King
english.segment5: Oh, I'm gonna sing. Yeah. Oh, I'm gonna sing. Yeah
english.segment6: Here it is, inside out. All will know what I'm about. I'm not holding back now. Oh, ohh
english.segment7: I won't deny what You have done. You are my saving one. I'm not holding back
english.segment8: I'm gonna sing. I'm gonna dance. I'm gonna praise You. Like I never had the chance
english.segment9: And I'm gonna run. Like I've been set free. I'm gonna live. All for You my King
english.segment10: Ohh, I'm gonna sing. I will not be silent. I'll become even more dignified than this. Ohh, oh, ohh. I will not be silent. I'll become even more dignified than this
english.segment11: I'm gonna sing. I'm gonna dance. I'm gonna praise You. Like I never had the chance
english.segment12: And I'm gonna run. Like I've been set free. I'm gonna live. All for You my King
english.segment13: Oh, I'm gonna sing. Oh, I'm gonna sing. Oh, I'm gonna sing. Oh, I'm gonna sing. I'm gonna sing
